Variables.Variable: CASE SES.D_RACE_CODE WHEN 'W' THEN 8527 WHEN 'A' THEN 8515 WHEN 'U' THEN 0 WHEN 'H' THEN 0 WHEN 'B' THEN 8516 ELSE 0 END as RaceConceptId
CASE SES.D_RACE_CODE WHEN 'W' THEN 38003564 WHEN 'A' THEN 38003564 WHEN 'U' THEN 0 WHEN 'H' THEN 38003563 WHEN 'B' THEN 38003564 ELSE 0 END as EthnicityConceptId
CASE SES.D_RACE_CODE WHEN 'W' THEN D_RACE_CODE WHEN 'A' THEN D_RACE_CODE WHEN 'B' THEN D_RACE_CODE ELSE NULL END AS RACE
CASE SES.D_RACE_CODE WHEN 'H' THEN D_RACE_CODE ELSE NULL END AS ETHNICITY

QueryDefinition.Query:
with a as ( SELECT DISTINCT mce.PATID, mce.YRDOB, mce.GDR_CD, mce.ELIGEFF, mce.ELIGEND, CASE WHEN mce.eligeff < '05/01/2000' THEN '05/01/2000' ELSE mce.eligeff END as startDate, 44814722 as PeriodTypeConceptId, {raceConceptId}, {ethnicityConceptId}, {race}, {ethnicity}, {location},
case when me.bus = 'MCR' then 281 when me.health_exch = '1' then 275 when me.health_exch in ('2','3') then 276 when me.bus = 'COM' then 327 else 0 end as PAYER_CONCEPT_ID, CONCAT(me.bus, me.health_exch) as PAYER_SOURCE_VALUE, CONCAT(me.product, me.cdhp) as PLAN_SOURCE_VALUE, CONCAT(me.aso, me.group_nbr) as SPONSOR_SOURCE_VALUE, {familysource} FROM {sc}.MEMBER_CONTINUOUS_ENROLLMENT mce {sesJoin} JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND mce.PATID = ch.PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN {sc}.MEMBER_ENROLLMENT me ON mce.PATID = me.PATID )
select a.*, m2.patid as baby_person_id, min(CAST((CAST(m2.yrdob AS VARCHAR) || '-' || DATE_PART('MONTH', m2.eligeff) || '-01') AS DATE)) as baby_dob from a left join a m2 on a.patid != m2.patid and a.gdr_cd = 'F' and a.FAMILY_SOURCE_VALUE is not null and a.FAMILY_SOURCE_VALUE = m2.FAMILY_SOURCE_VALUE and m2.yrdob - a.yrdob >= 12 and m2.yrdob - DATE_PART('YEAR', m2.eligeff) = 0 group by a.patid, a.yrdob, a.gdr_cd, a.eligeff, a.eligend, a.startdate, a.periodtypeconceptid, a.raceconceptid, a.ethnicityconceptid, a.race, a.ethnicity, a.location, a.PAYER_CONCEPT_ID, a.PAYER_SOURCE_VALUE, a.PLAN_SOURCE_VALUE, a.SPONSOR_SOURCE_VALUE, a.FAMILY_SOURCE_VALUE, baby_person_id order by a.PATID
